panels.description: Connections closed per second in the window.

panels.description: Total connections closed in the window.
panels.title: connection-close-total

panels.description: New connections established per second in the window.
panels.title: connection-creation-rate

panels.description: Total new connections established in the window.
panels.title: connection-creation-total

panels.description: The average number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections per second.
panels.title: network-io-rate

panels.description: The total number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections.
panels.title: network-io-total

panels.description: The average number of outgoing bytes sent per second to all servers.
panels.title: outgoing-byte-rate

panels.description: The total number of outgoing bytes sent to all servers.
panels.title: outgoing-byte-total

panels.description: The average number of requests sent per second.
panels.title: request-rate

panels.description: The total number of requests sent.
panels.title: request-total

panels.description: The average size of all requests in the window.
panels.title: request-size-avg

panels.description: The maximum size of any request sent in the window.
panels.title: request-size-max

panels.description: Bytes/second read off all sockets.
panels.title: incoming-byte-rate

panels.description: Total bytes read off all sockets.
panels.title: incoming-byte-total

panels.description: Responses received per second.
panels.title: response-rate

panels.description: Total responses received.
panels.title: response-total

panels.description: Number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform per second.
panels.title: select-rate

panels.description: Total number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform.
panels.title: select-total

panels.description: The average length of time the I/O thread spent waiting for a socket ready for reads or writes in nanoseconds.
panels.title: io-wait-time-ns-avg

panels.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent waiting.
panels.title: io-wait-ratio

panels.description: The average length of time for I/O per select call in nanoseconds.
panels.title: io-time-ns-avg

panels.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent doing I/O.
panels.title: io-ratio

panels.description: The current number of active connections.
panels.title: connection-count

panels.title: successful-reauthentication-total

panels.title: reauthentication-latency-avg

panels.title: failed-reauthentication-rate

panels.title: successful-authentication-no-reauth-total
